name: Shoaibi Group
overview:
Established more than 30 years ago, the Shoaibi Group has an established reputation for engineering excellence and reliability in the oil, gas, power, IT and telecommunications sectors where it draws on local and international resources to benefit both its partners and customers.

The Shoaibi Group is a wholly-owned Saudi Arabian organisation established to develop and carry out industrial and commercial activities in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia , across the Middle East and internationally.

The Group achieves this aim through a network of joint venture companies, partnerships and agencies in association with international and domestic companies.

Group headquarters are located in Al Khobar, with subsidiaries in Dammam, Riyadh, Jeddah and United Kingdom. Besides, the group operates through a number of associated companies network worldwide. The Group principally operates in these sectors:

Oil, Gas & Petrochemicals Power IT & Telecommunication The Shoaibi Group is a founding member of the Gulf Capital, Gulf One Bank, Venture Capital Bank and Saudi United Cooperative Insurance Company.

offices.address1: Shoaibi Building, King Abdul Aziz Street

funding_round.source_description: Scottish Equity Partners invests in Fotech
